Sparkamek.title: About Sparkamek
texts: Sparkamek is an open-source software that allows you manage Kamek 1.3.X projects, which are C++ projects that have for goal to add code to NSMBW.
Sparkamek was programmed by %s, is written in Python, uses PySide 6 for the interface and is available for Windows, MacOS and Linux.
Go to the %s for more information.
Special thanks to %s for the help with some features.
